dict.string: - Leopard Front Row support. - Bug Fix: Due to a change in Leopard, iScrobbler would fail to restore the persistent queue. - Bug Fix: Possible (and likely) crash while generating a Profile report. - Bug Fix: iTunes import would fail to import any songs for non-English users. - Bug Fix (Regression): The Top Lists window was not remembering whether it was open or closed. - Bug Fix: Explicitly deny manual-sync iPod support for multiple play detection.
